title: Pop the Balloons
author: MicroGames
essence: Balloons float up the screen — tap them to pop and score! Missed balloons reduce your score. Bright colors and gentle motion, perfect for first touch interactions on mobile.
reactions: Gentle rhythm: Constant motion with instant visual feedback after each tap — no menus or reading required.
Hand–eye coordination: Tapping targets improves precision and attention while keeping frustration very low.
Snackable: Rounds can be started and resumed quickly, fully optimized for touch on phones.

title: Match the Colors
author: MicroGames
essence: A color name appears; tap the circle that matches it. Each choice updates your progress and starts a new, simple round with three big options for easy touch.
reactions: Learn by play: Recognize basic colors, with friendly feedback on each choice.
Clean UI: Three large, spaced circles — no clutter and no distractions.
Short and repeatable: New rounds take seconds, ideal for quick sessions on mobile.

title: Name the Object
author: Ploynky
essence: Tap simple objects (apple, star, car, house, tree, sun) and Ploynky will say their names. A gentle game for first words on mobile.
reactions: Clear visuals and big tap targets.
Instant TTS feedback for vocabulary building.
Great for toddlers exploring on touch screens.

title: Goal Kick
author: Ploynky
essence: Ball at center, moving target band on the goal. Tap to shoot; TTS feedback for Goal or Miss; auto-restart with countdown.

title: Tic‑Tac‑Toe
author: Ploynky
essence: Classic 3×3 tic‑tac‑toe with a friendly opponent. Simple visuals for kids.

title: Whack-a-Mole
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: Whack the moles as they pop up from their holes. A fun game to test your reflexes.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
author: CodeWithRandom
essence: The classic hand game. Choose rock, paper, or scissors and see if you can beat the computer.
reactions: A game of chance and psychology.
